ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:41:49 [Issue ID 4000-45608] urn:comicvine:4000-45608 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:02:58. [Issue ID 62467]
ComicInfo.Summary: Dead Reckoning Part 2: 2nd Stringers & Dead Ringers: With Deadpool dead, Dixon convinces Captain America to become the Mithras and fight Tiamat. Tiamat contacts his people and tells them that the Mithras is dead. Zoe and Al find that they have survived the explosion of Deadpool’s apartment but Deadpool is nowhere to be found. Gerry contacts Zoe and reveals that he is the lost partner of Landau, Luckman & Lake. The Watcher watches in horror as a giant alien abomination moves in on Earth.
ComicInfo.Title: Dead Reckoning Part 2: 2nd Stringers & Dead Ringers
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
